query.name: pickupLocationId
query.description: The unique id of the pickup location where the product is stored

query.name: productId
query.description: the RPC of the Product (so the RedMart-specific code, not the merchant-specific code)

query.name: stockLotId
query.description: Identifier of the requested Stock Lot. For now always hardcoded to "0" (please note the String type, do not always expect it to be a number !)

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/rss/stockLot/update')
request.add_api_parameter("storeId", "414")
request.add_api_parameter("pickupLocationId", "1837")
request.add_api_parameter("productId", "1000152")
request.add_api_parameter("stockLotId", "0")
request.add_api_parameter("stockLotUpdateDTO", "{\"quantityAtPickupLocation\":\"10\"}")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/rss/stockLot/update')
request.add_api_param('storeId', '414')
request.add_api_param('pickupLocationId', '1837')
request.add_api_param('productId', '1000152')
request.add_api_param('stockLotId', '0')
request.add_api_param('stockLotUpdateDTO', '{\"quantityAtPickupLocation\":\"10\"}')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
